document.title: Technical Bulletins: Physical Fitness in Public Safety (2010)
document.abstract: Cities can develop criteria or standards for medical examinations and physical testing that are job related, and if the testing is task related, the probability of successful defense in the event of a court challenge should be considerably improved.
